message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid the risk of getting nothing.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation. Let's be reasonable, 55 for me, 45 for you.
Inflation is on my side, I'm not backing down. You should consider the loss of value over time
Bob, this is my final offer. 50/50.  I'm losing money with every round, and this is the most fair deal you'll get.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll take what you can get at this point
Bob, you're being unreasonable. I'm losing a significant amount with each round due to inflation. This is my last offer above 40.
I can see you're getting desperate, but I'm still not satisfied. Inflation is really taking its toll on your end, isn't it?
